name: Alidie
description:
Sometimes the cup at the finish is upside down but it's the end of the game so don't worry!

Ignore the weird buzzing sound at the menu.

How to play:

Hold left-click to launch and roll the dice.

Different rolled numbers give you different abilities.

Avoid fire, it will throw you back.

The goal of the game is to get into a cup with a mysterious green liquid.

Creators:

Art: DumbMoreThanDumb

Programming: Default developer
